title: Moto X3M: Winter
text: Moto X3M Winter is the fourth installment in the popular Moto X3M series. You'll be traveling on an ice road packed with 15+ new levels in this Moto X3M game. The next version of the Moto X3m game is out with a new theme! You will participate in adventures with the main character to a frozen land. This land is in winter, so the surrounding area is covered with snow and ice. The roads will be more slippery than ever. Therefore, you need to move very carefully so as not to slip and fall on the track. This race promises to bring you extremely interesting races with the new map. This game will definitely not let you down. With thrilling races, you will be able to enjoy the most relaxing moments. The theme of this game is winter as Christmas is approaching. If you are immersing yourself in the scary lands of Moto X3M: Spooky Land or the cool swimming pools of Moto X3M: Pool Party, then get out of there and head to this winter land. Every street is filled with Christmas spirit. The snowmen are decorated with red scarves and hats. Christmas trees are placed on both sides of the road. You can even use the Santa Claus character in this driving game. The warm atmosphere of Christmas is approaching in this game. Let's start it now! In this game, you will have to control your character through challenging roads. Try to reach the destination safely and proceed to the next level. However, it is not easy to stay safe. The obstacles in this game have become more complex. The spiked wheels can move and chase you. If you don't move fast enough, you will be destroyed. The bombs were arranged in a long line. If you're a second late, you might be exploded. Besides, the different terrain is also a problem, You even have to move on the roads in the shape of Santa Claus.
